name: Karaoke
rules: Grab the mic, sing with passion, and enjoy the moment. It's that simple.
points: Your points are based on how well you sing.

name: Cards Against Humanity
rules: Pick the funniest card combo to win. No limits. Get ready to laugh hard.
points: Points for the most hilarious pairings.

name: Hot Seat
rules: Answer personal questions while others guess your responses. Be honest!
points: Points for correct guesses and honesty.

name: Monopoly
rules: Buy, trade, and build to bankrupt your opponents. Strategy is key!
points: Points for money, properties, and strategy.

name: UNO
rules: Match colors and numbers, use action cards to beat your opponents.
points: First to empty their hand wins the points.

name: WHAT DO YOU MEME
rules: Pair captions with images to create the funniest meme. Let the laughs roll.
points: Points for the most hilarious meme.

name: TELL ME WITHOUT TELLING ME
rules: Get your team to guess the word without saying it directly. Be creative.
points: Points for the most accurate guesses.

name: LUDO
rules: Move all your pieces around the board to the finish line. Race to win!
points: Points for each piece safely home.

name: SCRABBLE
rules: Form words with letter tiles to score points. The longer, the better.
points: Points based on the value of letters used.

name: CHESS
rules: Outsmart your opponent to checkmate their king. Think ahead and win.
points: Points for capturing pieces and winning.

name: LETS GO DEEP
rules: Answer personal questions to get to know each other on a deeper level.

name: XXX
rules: Get creative and let your imagination run wild with this game.
points: Earn points for the most inventive answers.
